location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Rough Tracing Showing Approach to P.D. (Q.) Jetty at Dohat ez Zekrit. (QATAR)'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: ink on paperDimensions: 342 x 290 mm; on sheet 369 x 333 mm.Foliation: The map has been foliated in the top right hand corner with a pencil number enclosed in a circle.

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Reliefs shown by hachures. Shows the Jebel Dukhan promontory, Dohat et Zehrit, the surrounding shoals and water depth.Inscriptions:Descriptive notes on recto:Below the title: 'Soundings in feet corrected to lowest tide level observed to date 16/1/38.'

name.namePart: Adviser to the Government of Bahrain
Secretary of State for India and Burma, United Kingdom
Secretary of State for India, United Kingdom
Shaikh Ḥamad bin 'Īsá Āl Khalīfah, Hakim of Bahrain
Shaikh Hakim of Bahrain Salmān bin Ḥamad Āl Khalīfah
King of Saudi Arabia Sa'ūd bin 'Abd al-'Azīz Āl Sa'ūd
